name: trunk-logistics
description: TrunkLogistics - MVP platform connecting customers with logistics providers

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy:build: npm run deploy:prep && cd client && npm run build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:build && npm run deploy:migrate
scripts.test: echo "Run tests in client and server directories"

author: TrunkLogistics Team
